item.title: High School Chromebook Shenanigans
item.description: High school sucked, and I’m gonna talk about a time where I was able to use a Chromebook to slack off in ways that most students could only dream of.

item.title: Welcome to my Blog!
item.description: For years, I’ve wanted to make my own blog and website but was never able to get the motivation to sit down and do it. Now, it’s a reality.
